issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Haven't debugged the NPE, but seems cosmetic so far ( at least from my EBS test's point of view). Something to in the 'migration' area? Thanks, -M {code} [root@eucahost-51-21 ~]# euca-detach-volume vol-F84440D3 DetachVolumeType: class java.lang.NullPointerException [root@eucahost-51-21 ~]# euca-describe-volumes vol-F84440D3 VOLUME vol-F84440D3 1 PARTI00 available 2013-04-22T23:38:29.504Z [root@eucahost-51-21 ~]# euca-detach-volume vol-F84440D3 --debug 2013-04-22 16:52:06,300 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Method: POST 2013-04-22 fields.summary: NPE when detaching a detached volume
fields.environment:
192.168.51.21	CENTOS	6.4	64	REPO	[UI CLC WS CC00 SC00]
192.168.51.24	CENTOS	6.4	64	REPO	[NC00]

comments.body:
commit 2122e45265eecb3ab083153cd71e12b13e661739
Author: Neil Soman <neil@eucalyptus.com>
Date:   Wed Apr 24 18:18:50 2013 -0700

No longer seeing this:

{code}
[root@clcfrontend ~]# euca-describe-volumes
VOLUME  vol-768037C9    1               one     available       2013-05-20T23:29:35.599Z        standard
[root@clcfrontend ~]# euca-detach-volume vol-768037C9
euca-detach-volume: error (DetachVolumeType): Volume is not attached: vol-768037C9
[root@clcfrontend ~]#
{code}
